snippet: Andreas Georgiou, who was recruited in 2010 to help get Greece’s famously unreliable public accounting in order, has become the target of a criminal investigation.
abstract: Andreas Georgiou, who was recruited in 2010 to help get Greece’s unreliable public accounting in order, has become target of a criminal investigation; while Greece's insolvency was inevitable, its loan agreements are based solely on numbers produced by Georgiou.

byline.contributor: Nikolas Leontopoulos and Dimitris Bounias contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Andreas Georgiou, who was recruited in 2010 to help get Greece’s famously unreliable public accounting in order, has become the target of a criminal investigation.

headline.seo: Greek Official Under Scrutiny for Pre-Crash Budget Figures
headline.main: Greek Statistician Under Scrutiny for Budget Estimates Before Euro Crisis
headline.print_headline: Greek Statistician Under Scrutiny for Budget Estimates Before Euro Crisis
